name: d3-dag
description: Layout algorithms for visualizing directed acylic graphs.
author: Erik Brinkman <erik.brinkman@gmail.com>

scripts.publish: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" dist/d3-dag.js -c -m -o dist/d3-dag.min.js
scripts.examples: while ! lsof -t -i:7777 > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done && for EX in examples/*.html; do chromium-browser --headless --screenshot --window-size=256,256 "http://localhost:7777/${EX}" && mv screenshot.png "${EX%.html}.png"; done
